data.event: Formerly a city in its own right, the cities of Kew, Hawthorn and Camberwell were amalgamated in 1994 to form the City of Boroondara.
In 1838 Dight travelled down the Yarra from Heidelberg and decided to locate a water-powered mill on a site adjacent to the falls; the impressive three-storey mill opened in 1840.
In 1838 Dight travelled down the Yarra from Heidelberg and decided to locate a water-powered mill on a site adjacent to the falls; the impressive three-storey mill opened in 1840.

event.title: run at Studley Park, on the eastern bank of the Yarra River, in 1840

data.event: John Hodgson established a squatters run at Studley Park, on the eastern bank of the Yarra River, in 1840.
Studley House, also known as Burke Hall, built in 1857, was named after Hodgson's birthplace of Studley, Yorkshire and the house is now on the Register of the National Estate.

event.title: were made to the house in 1875

data.event: Modifications were made to the house in 1875 and 1919.
The nearby Villa Alba, built before 1863, is open to the public.
